channel.title: My second Sig
channel.description:
This took me about 20 minutes to do because I tried other options but it made the sig look worse. I don't know how to use brushes on a sig. So if anyone could help me with that I'd appreciate it This was done in GIMP =]
[IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg129/Omega1210/GokuV1-2.jpg[/img]
Works now :D It looked better as a GIF but Jpeg only worked for this.. :S

item.title: My second Sig
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

It was an after thought that you did do that. I apologize. I was being an idiot. For your second image on GIMP. It’s OK, for a beginner. I hope that you will find some good tutorials to help you learn.

Thank you ThAt. Now was that so hard to be nice? xD. Thanks for that, my first like 4 sigs were freestyle. Now i’m gonna start looking for good TuTs. On like gimptalk or something. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 20, 2008, 05:45:10 PM[/size][hr][quote=“exe626, post:31, topic:190359”][quote author=OmidSan link=topic=253814.msg2122061#msg2122061 date=1205996714]
Ok, so how old are you now? And sorry I didn’t really do these kinda things when I was that young. I only started playing runescape around like 11-12 years old. Good that you posted it. And I really don’t think you did that alone just starting without any help/advice at all.

Also, if you were truly that great as you say with GFXs you would see that I didn’t just put Concave lines around. I added a supernova where he’s doing a kamehameha. I sharpened up the image a bit. Also, I added softglow to reflect the light of the kamehameha towards his face.
[/quote]With that said, I still think the image sucks.[/quote]
Didn’t I already say that it would suck? I told you I’m a beginner.

Read full topic

Also, I added softglow to reflect the light of the kamehameha towards his face.[/quote]With that said, I still think the image sucks.

item.title: My second Sig
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

Actually, Omidsan. I made that when I was 12. It’s not that great because it was my first. You asked that I post it up here, so I did. I don’t need C&C from you to improve my first image. That is a lot better than a picture of fucking Goku with concave lines around it.

Ok, so how old are you now? And sorry I didn’t really do these kinda things when I was that young. I only started playing runescape around like 11-12 years old. Good that you posted it. And I really don’t think you did that alone just starting without any help/advice at all.

Also, if you were truly that great as you say with GFXs you would see that I didn’t just put Concave lines around. I added a supernova where he’s doing a kamehameha. I sharpened up the image a bit. Also, I added softglow to reflect the light of the kamehameha towards his face.

Read full topic

item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:19, topic:190359”]Mine was posted up here about 6 or 7 months ago. When I was flaming someone about a shitty Pixel. I’ll go get it.

EDIT: [/quote]
Not that great, and you’re probably like a fking 25 year old. Who has nothing else to do so in your free time(which is always) you could take time on that.

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:21, topic:190359”][quote author=nator123123 link=topic=253814.msg2119652#msg2119652 date=1205910322]

Want to buy new eyes…? WTF

It’s an insult… do I have to explain it?

[size=3pt]Your sig burns his eyes and he wants to get new ones. Kinda awkward explaining an insult?[/size]
[/quote]
Even simplier

He thinks your sig looks like shit.[/quote]
So does your face.

That. I know it’s terrible. I never said it was good now did i?

ZeroDegrease:

It’s basically exactly the same as your first signature.

Really? How about you post up a Sig? I don’t really care if they are the same. I like that kinda style. It’s not my fault that my first and 2nd aren’t gonna be somewhat similar.

Read full topic

item.title: My second Sig
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:11, topic:190359”][quote author=OmidSan link=topic=253814.msg2118733#msg2118733 date=1205891090]

Most of my sigs are smudge sigs.

I’m horrible at smudging… Lol.

[/quote]

No, you’re just a noob.

As a very smart member of the Graphics board once said. “GIMP is not a hindrance. And shouldn’t be treated as a crutch for people bad at graphics.” You make multiple excuses in one single post. Which is pitiful. Your work represents you as a person. So, your work being pitiful, makes you pitiful.

If you don’t at least have pride in your own work. You have nothing but a shitty picture. “Oh, it’s my second sig. Oh, it took me twenty minutes. Oh, it looked better as a .png. Oh, I used GIMP.” Quit making excuses. I don’t want to hear them, and it sure as Hell won’t get you a better rating.

All you did in this image was add a sunburst, or some sort of vector lines. Over top your stock. That’s it. It’s very hideous, and puts GIMP to shame.

0/10[/quote]
Oh, sorry that this is my 2nd day doing GFXes. and Sorry i’m not gonna be perfect in 1 fucking day. I just said I was bad cause I WAS NEW AT IT. I’VE NEVER FREAKING MADE A SIG BEFORE UNTIL 2 DAYS AGO. I SAID IT TOOK ABOUT 20 MINUTES BECAUSE I DIDN’T KNOW HOW ELSE TO ADD ON. I TRIED EVERY SINGLE FILTER AND TRIED BRUSHING BUT IT JUST MADE IT WORSE.

Wtf is a sunburst. I didn’t use that. You’re a real asshole to anyone that’s new at doing these kinds of things. Did you expect me to just take like 2 hours and make like the best sig ever?

Read full topic

item.title: My second Sig
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“OmidSan, post:10, topic:190359”][quote author=nator123123 link=topic=253814.msg2118239#msg2118239 date=1205875644]
Most of my sigs are smudge sigs.
[/quote]
I’m horrible at smudging… Lol.[/quote]

No, you’re just a noob.

As a very smart member of the Graphics board once said. “GIMP is not a hindrance. And shouldn’t be treated as a crutch for people bad at graphics.” You make multiple excuses in one single post. Which is pitiful. Your work represents you as a person. So, your work being pitiful, makes you pitiful.

If you don’t at least have pride in your own work. You have nothing but a shitty picture. “Oh, it’s my second sig. Oh, it took me twenty minutes. Oh, it looked better as a .png. Oh, I used GIMP.” Quit making excuses. I don’t want to hear them, and it sure as Hell won’t get you a better rating.

All you did in this image was add a sunburst, or some sort of vector lines. Over top your stock. That’s it. It’s very hideous, and puts GIMP to shame.

0/10

Read full topic
